003.name: Robot
003.text: It seems that we have crashed onto the planet we were surveying.

006.name: CrewOne
006.text: Sir, some of the crew members here are injured.

007.name: CrewOne
007.text: Also, the Power Reactor has been shut off. Power is limited in the entire ship.

008.name: CrewOne
008.text: Some of the doors are not functioning. Crew members in different rooms are currently trapped.

009.name: Commander
009.text: Hmmm. We should tend to those injured and rescue those who are trapped.

010.name: Commander
010.text: Player, since you’re here, I need you to rescue our comrades.

011.name: Commander
011.text: Afterwards, do check on the reactor.

012.name: Commander
012.text: Robot, kindly assist the Player in his task.

014.name: Robot
014.text: Hello, Player! I will be assisting you throughout your mission.

015.name: Robot
015.text: Let’s head outside and rescue those who are trapped.
